alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 10:59AM AKST until February 04 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of freezing rain expected. Additional 5 to 10 inches of snow expected. Ice accumulation less than one quarter inch. * WHERE...Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. Ice and snow accumulation may bring down trees, power lines, and weakened structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow and periods of freezing rain are expected to increase in intensity Thursday morning before a transition to all rain late Thursday through Friday morning. Confidence remains low regarding the exact timing of the transition to rain and the freezing rain potential Thursday morning. An earlier or later transition and freezing rain may greatly affect snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
